Package com.soprabanking.ips.controllers

Class UpvotesController

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.controllers.UpvotesController
@RestController
@CrossOrigin
@RequestMapping("/upvotes")
public class UpvotesController
extends java.lang.Object
Upvotes Controller This is a controller class for upvotes done on proposals. The UpvotesController Class implements an application which does the following
  • like
  • dislike
  • return if a user has upvoted a proposal
Author:
mojha
See Also:
RestController, CrossOrigin, RequestMapping, Autowired, PostMapping

  • Method Details

    • upvoteProposal

      @PostMapping(value="/like", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> upvoteProposal​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to Like a proposal in a String which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status
      Some variables used in this method are
      • upvotesService : an Object of the UpvotesService
      • upvoteProposal : a method in class UpvotesService called by object upvotesService
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the upvote
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a success string with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      UpvotesService, Upvotes

    • reverseupvoteProposal

      @PostMapping(value="/dislike", consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.String> reverseupvoteProposal​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to dislike a proposal in a String which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status
      Some variables used in this method are
      • upvotesService : an Object of the UpvotesService
      • reverseUpvote : a method in class UpvotesService called by object upvotesService
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the dislike
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a success string with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      UpvotesService, Upvotes

    • hasUpvotedOrNot

      @PostMapping(value="/hasUpvoted", consumes="application/json", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Boolean> hasUpvotedOrNot​(@RequestBody java.lang.String body)
      This is a method used to check if a proposal has been upvoted by the user in a String which is sent in a Response Entity. ResponseEntity represents an HTTP response, including headers, body, and status
      Some variables used in this method are
      • upvotesService : an Object of the UpvotesService
      • hasUpvoted : a method in class UpvotesService called by object upvotesService
      Parameters:
      body - of string type containing the dislike
      Returns:
      Response Entity with a boolean true value if the user has upvoted the proposal with a OK Http Status
      See Also:
      UpvotesService, Upvotes
